metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7505 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the gif_next_LZW function in libnsgif.c inLibnsgif 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted LZW stream in a GIF file.

criterions.comment: libnsgif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
